title: Kaatrai Konjam Lyrics Neethane En Ponvasantham Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kaatrai Konjam
Singer: Karthik
Movie  : Neethaane En Ponvasantham
Music  : Ilaiyaraaja

Click Here for Lyrics in Tamil

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Kaatrai konjam nirkka sonnen
poopparithu korkka sonnen
odi vandhu unnai sandhikka

Methai ondru thaikka sonnen
megam alli vaikka sonnen
konnai moodi unnai sindhikka

suttru boomi nirka sonnen
unnai thaedi paarka sonne
ennai pattri ketka sonnen
en kaadhal nalama edru

Kaatrai konjam nirkka sonnen
poopparithu korkka sonnen
odi vandhu unnai sandhikka

Methai ondru thaikka sonnen
megam alli vaikka sonnen
konnai moodi unnai sindhikka

neril paarthu pesum kadhal
ooril undu yeraalam
nenjin ullil pesum kaadhal
nindru vazhum ennaalum

thalli thalli ponaalum
unnai enni vazhum oru
aezhai endhan nenjathai paaradi

thanga methai pottaalum
unnninaivil enaalum
thookamillai yen indru solladi

Saathi vaitha veetil dheepam
yetri vaikka nee vaa vaa
meedhi vaitha kanavai ellaam
pese theerkalaam .. hey hey hey ..
Kaatrai konjam nirkka sonnen ..

netru en kanavil vandhaai
nooru mutham thandhaaye
kaalai ezhundhu paarkum podhu
kannil nindru kondaaye

Paarthu paarthu ennaalum
paadhukaathu en nenju
enna maayam seithaayo solladi

unnai paartha naal thottu
ennam odum thari kettu
innnum enna seivaayo solladi

enna indru meetkathaan
unnai thaedi vandhaene
meettathodu meendum
naan tholikiren hey hey ..

Kaatrai konjam nirkka sonnen
poopparithu korkka sonnen
odi vandhu unnai sandhikka

Kaatrai konjam nirkka sonnen English Translation
I tried my best :)
i told air to stop by, and
told to pluck flower and join them,
to run and meet you.

i told to stitch a bed,
i told to keep cloud,
to think only you by closing eyes.

i told rotating earth to stop,
i told to search for you,
I told to enquire about you,
to see whether my love is doing good ?

i told air to stop by, and
told to pluck flower and join them,
to run and meet you.

i told to stitch a bed,
i told to keep cloud,
to think only you by closing eyes.

there are lot of love,
where they talk in person.
Love that talks inside heart
will live forever.

even you go away a little,
just look into my poor heart
that always think you.

even if there is golden bed,
just tell that there is no sleep
while thinking about you.

you shold come to light the lamp
in the closed house.
we will discuss about all the
left out dreams … hey hey hey …
i told air to stop by,

you came in my dream yesterday
and gave thousand kisses.
while getting up in morning,
you still stood in my eyes.

seeing you all days,
what magic did you do
to my heart ?

from first day after seeing you
thoughts will run endless
what else you will do, tell me ?

to rescue myself,
i came to you today,
after rescuing, I lost myself again
hey hey hey. .

i told air to stop by, and
told to pluck flower and join them,
to run and meet you.

i told to stitch a bed,
i told to keep cloud,
to think only you by closing eyes.

i told rotating earth to stop,
i told to search for you,
I told to enquire about you,
to see whether my love is doing good ?

i told air to stop by,..
